poem:
### Digital Monarchs

In flickering glow, kings of moments  
hold court upon pixelled throne.  
Suburban whispers, humorous crowns,  
echo across transformed land.  
Time, a sly spectator, watches  
cartoons grow into pillars,  
yet beneath laughter's reign  
linger cries of simpler roots—  
a longing for hills untouched  
by the ceaseless churn of change.
